itemDisplayName: Advanced Linux : Deploy a Multi VM Couchbase Cluster with Ansible
description: This advanced template deploys N  Linux VMs (CentsOS or Ubuntu) and it configures a Multi VM Couchbase Cluster.
summary: This advanced template deploys a Multi VM Couchbase cluster.It uses the Ansible Playbooks provided by couchbaselabs in the GitHub repo ansible-couchbase-server to deploy Couchbase.
